generalMessages.content:
The {siteName} processes all Go Live requests each business day, between 4 and 6:00pmE, unless a specific date/time is requested.

All requests received after 4:00pmE may not be processed until the next business day.

If you have any questions about this policy or need a Go Live request processed immediately, please email the Web Marketing Operations Team.

cannedMessages.content: Please make the following revisions and resubmit.
This content has multiple misspellings and/or grammatical errors. Please correct and re-submit.
This content uses incorrect or outdated terms, images, and/or colors. Please correct and re-submit.

This content has non-working links that may be due to incomplete and/or misspelled URLs. Any links directing users to websites without the Acme.com primary navigation, or directing users to a document must open in a new browser window. Please correct and re-submit.

This content needs the approval of its section's owner to insure there is no negative impact on other pages/areas of section, etc. Once you have their approval please email the Web Marketing Operations Team and re-submit this Go Live request.

completeMessages.content:
An email notification has been sent to the Web Marketing Operations Team. Your content will be reviewed and (if approved) pushed live between 4:00pmE and 6:00pmE of the business day that the request was received. If this request is sent after business hours, it will be reviewed and (if approved) pushed live as soon as possible, the next business day.

If you need to make further revisions to this item, please re-submit this Go Live request after making them.

If this request needs immediate attention, please email the Web Marketing Operations team.
Item(s) has been pushed for delete. It will be deleted shortly.
Item(s) has been pushed live. It will be visible on the live site shortly.
The scheduled item(s) will go live on: ${date}.
Rejection has been sent. Item(s) have NOT been pushed live and have returned to draft state.
Item(s) has been pushed for delete. It will be deleted shortly.
Item(s) have been scheduled to go live.
